content:
by  Jay Huerbin September  

It seems like Elizabeth Adams is going to do just fine in her junior season PERIOD

Last year Adams teamed up with nowgraduated senior Kristy Borza on her way to  wins  a singleseason record at Pitt  in No PERIOD  doubles PERIOD

But despite the loss of Borza Adams looked sharp on her way to an Honors Singles finals appearance at a tournament in West Point this past weekend PERIOD

Thats good news for the Panthers who are expecting big things from Adams this year PERIOD

She picked herself back up after her secondround loss and beat some good players head coach George Dieffenbach said PERIOD She made good progress this weekend and will get better after this tournament. the Panthers were one of nearly  teams to travel to New York for the West Point Eastern Tennis Invitational  the first of the year for Pitt PERIOD

As the No PERIOD  seed in the tournament Adams fell to Victoria Aiello from Middleburg College in the second round of No PERIOD  singles but that didnt slow her down PERIOD She went on to finish second in her consolation bracket the Honors Singles PERIOD

It was a strong showing but not the only one for the Panthers at the tournament PERIOD

Sophomore Minh Evans who started out playing in the No PERIOD  singles bracket lost to Lauren Rottkamp of Bucknell in the first round PERIOD But she went on to capture the Faith Singles title PERIOD

Both Evans and Adams finished the tournament going  PERIOD

Their success comes as no surprise to Dieffenbach PERIOD The Panthers are coming off a successful season which included a  overall record and a  showing in Big East play PERIOD

Its a very strong tournament he said PERIOD The purpose of these early season tournaments is to face fine competition PERIOD Adams and Evans grew from this and it will help them. last year also marked the highest finish at the Big East Championships for the Panthers PERIOD Pitt tied for seventh after entering the tournament as the No PERIOD  seed PERIOD

In the conference tournament Adams led the Panthers to a firstround defeat of Cincinnati in the Big East Championships  the victory was the firstever for the team in the first round of the tournament PERIOD

She finished the season with a  record was named the team MVP after the tournament and earned AllBig East honors after the season PERIOD

Adams looks to lead the Panthers this year but other athletes are also stepping up PERIOD Senior Shannon Benic  and junior Adela Aprodu  also collected wins at the Invitational PERIOD

Benic took part in the third singles bracket losing her first match but advancing to the semifinals of the consolation bracket PERIOD In the No PERIOD  singles bracket Aprodu won her first round matchup before falling in the Round of  PERIOD

In doubles action freshmen Karma Parbhu and Gabrielle Catanzariti went  on the weekend and finished third in the Lichtenberg Doubles bracket PERIOD Two of their wins came against conference opponents Alexandra Harvey and Slavina Kaplanska of Seton Hall PERIOD

For Dieffenbach early season wins against Big East rivals are something to keep in mind PERIOD

Thats what we want he said about the doubles wins PERIOD We want to be able to face teams well see later on PERIOD We have confidence heading into the spring season that we can beat Big East opponents. the Panthers will take part in two more tournaments before the winter break PERIOD They will be in Norfolk Va. this weekend to take part in the Sergio Tacchini Invitational PERIOD
